name: Beast of the Best
description:
Solo only double Quest. 

Hero, before you embark on your adventures. It is wise to find an animal companion to aid you. The realm has many fantastic creatures, each blessed with abilities and the beauty that Dread otherwise would seek to corrupt and twist. Freeing these beasts and creatures from their captivity and from harm may result in them showing you back kindness in return. The Kit'ner Orc caves in the South-Eastern is due for liberation. Make may there and free our animal ally's.
